DataElement.preferredName: Dissolvable Tobacco Purchase Location Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties._The process by which something is acquired or obtained._A position, site, or point in space where something can be found._Any of various proprietary tobacco products that deliver nicotine as they dissolve or melt in the user's mouth._The action of obtaining something by payment._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease
